content: प्रतिनंद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bless; तौ गुरुर्गुरुपत्नी च प्रीत्या प्रतिननंदतुः <ls>R. 1. 57</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 146</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 87.</ls> {@--2@} To welcome, congratulate, hail with joy, receive gladly; प्रतिनंद्य स तां पूजां <ls>Mb.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 54.</ls> {@--3@} To accept cheerfully; <ls>Ku. 3. 2.</ls> {@--4@} To address kindly, show devotion. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To delight, gratify.
